txt.en: Destroyed blood reserves within Bâr Nírnaeth.
Blood reserves can be found in Bâr Nírnaeth, the Houses of Lamentation.\n\nYou should destroy the blood reserves.

You have successfully destroyed the blood reserves within Bâr Nírnaeth, the Houses of Lamentation, and have done a great service to all those working to reclaim Minas Ithil from the remnants of Sauron's forces.

'Many horrors lie in wait within Bâr Nírnaeth, the Houses of Lamentation. If you are to venture inside, I ask you to destroy the reserves of nourishment awaiting Morloth. The vessels of blood have gone through unspeakable rituals and must be destroyed before they can reach the roots of Morloth.'
There is much for the White Company to accomplish in reclaiming Minas Ithil from the remnants of Sauron's forces.
